gridContents.title: Roderick Cox
gridContents.explanation: In Berlin, Stephanie d’Arc Taylor meets the man who makes music move—orchestra conductor Roderick Cox.

gridContents.title: Marion Motion
gridContents.explanation: In the 1990s, Marion Motin swapped ballet classes for hip-hop battlegrounds in the Parisian banlieues. The celebrated choreographer talks to Daphnée Denis about her guiding belief in “immediate movement”—and why touring with Madonna almost broke her.

gridContents.title: Marion Motion

gridContents.title: Island Time
gridContents.explanation: Stretching out the summer on Madeira’s volcanic coastline.

gridContents.title: At Work With: Hariri & Hariri
gridContents.explanation: Sisters Gisue Hariri and Mojgan Hariri have always been “partners in crime." Charles Shafaieh meets them at their New York architecture studio."

gridContents.title: Ocean Vuong
gridContents.explanation: The poet and novelist avoiding definitive endings.

gridContents.title: Alexis Sablone
gridContents.explanation: Not many architects skate for their country, and not many skateboarders design the parks they skate in.

objectContents.title: Anne Tyler
objectContents.explanation: The author of sprawling family dramas on her own epic half-century of writing.

objectContents.title: Jenny Slate
objectContents.explanation: Keep your eye on the prize—and the ball.

objectContents.title: Jane Goodall
objectContents.explanation: From her perch in the tiny Tanzanian nature reserve of Gombe, primatologist Jane Goodall changed how we understand the nature of chimpanzees—and ourse

objectContents.title: Short Histories of Nearly Everything
objectContents.explanation: The bestsellers of the last decade look like a college reading list. DebikaRay Lokks at the rise of the "brainy book"

objectContents.title: At Home With: Nanushka
objectContents.explanation: Meet the bold couple who took their Budapest brand global.

threeCardContents.title: Phillip Youmans
threeCardContents.explanation: about walking the tightrope between teen prodigy and award-winning filmmaker.

threeCardContents.title: Desiree Akhavan
threeCardContents.explanation: he Iranian-American filmmaker bringing her “weird and sexy” stories—and her parents—to set.

threeCardContents.title: Theresa Traore Dahlberg
threeCardContents.explanation: When Theresa Traore Dahlberg realized that she couldn’t relate to narratives about women in West African films, she decided to make her own.

popularContents.title: Alexis Sablone
popularContents.notion: What do you get when you cross a free spirit with a stand-up comedian? At home in Los Angeles, Jenny Slate delivers the punch line.

Fashion.title: Rock Steady
Fashion.description: A breath of fresh air amid the ancient Stone Forest of southwestern China.

Fashion.title: Material Girl
Fashion.description: The most interesting people, stories and haircuts all have layers. This fall, so does your wardrobe.

Fashion.title: The Click Farm
Fashion.description: Meet the influencers, and owners, fighting like cats and dogs for your likes.

Fashion.title: Game Face
Fashion.description: Keep your eye on the prize—and the ball.

Fashion.title: Second Time Around
Fashion.description: A dance party for one spirals into another dimension.

Fashion.title: Island Time
Fashion.description: Stretching out the summer on Madeira’s volcanic coastline.

Fashion.title: Slow Sound
Fashion.description: Meet the musicians creating seasonal soundscapes from color swatches, in partnership with lifestyle brand Toast.

Fashion.title: Les Jardins de Marqueyssac
Fashion.description: In these maze-like gardens, getting lost turns out to be the most sensible path to take.

Fashion.title: Maryam Nassirzadeh
Fashion.description: The leader of New York’s most admired fashion set is just a cuddlebug who really, really likes her friends.

Fashion.title: The Borrowers
Fashion.description: They’re too big for their boots, and raiding your closet.

Fashion.title: Soft Strokes
Fashion.description: Fashion often looks to art for inspiration, so why not the other way round?

Fashion.title: Lana Turner
Fashion.description: A short stroll—and several wardrobe changes—with a woman who’s never tired of New York.

Fashion.title: Peripheral Visions
Fashion.description: An abstracted exploration of cloth and color, produced in partnership with HaaT.

Fashion.title: Alexandre Mattiussi
Fashion.description: Meet the French fashion designer who just wants to be friends.

Fashion.title: Framing Faces
Fashion.description: Good eyewear casts a long shadow.

Fashion.title: Things Fall Apart
Fashion.description: Love’s a well-learned pas de deux. Even if the feelings fade, the steps still feel familiar.

Fashion.title: The Furthest Dawn
Fashion.description: Under the low-hanging orb of an alien landscape, first light and a strange awakening.

Fashion.title: HaaT: Makiko Minagawa
Fashion.description: In partnership with HaaT, creative director Makiko Minagawa talks tradition, textiles and a half-century of collaborating with Issey Miyake.

Fashion.title: Carl Jan Cruz
Fashion.description: A fashion dispatch from the Philippine capital.

Fashion.title: The Hot Seat
Fashion.description: Like fashion, chairs can be sumptuous or simple, whimsical or practical, a frill or a necessity.
